sentence: Democratic activist Stacey Abrams, known for her get-out-the-vote activism, is running again for governor of Georgia after narrowly losing to the current governor, Brian Kemp, in 2018.

title: '2000 Mules' investigator: Georgia officials intimidating my witnesses
